snippet: The American Classical Orchestra, a period-instrument ensemble, opens its season at Alice Tully Hall with works by Haydn, Brahms and Mendelssohn.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews concert of works by Haydn, Brahms and Mendelssohn performed by the period-instrument ensemble American Classical Orchestra at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The American Classical Orchestra, a period-instrument ensemble, opens its season at Alice Tully Hall with works by Haydn, Brahms and Mendelssohn.

headline.seo: American Classical Orchestra Opens at Alice Tully Hall
headline.main: Instruments From Past Eras, Played for Modern Ears
headline.print_headline: Instruments From Past Eras, Played for Modern Ears
